== Elements ==

You can use the `nowrap` attribute on the following elements:

  * [BodyElement <body>]
  * [DdElement <dd>]
  * [DivElement <div>]
  * [DtElement <dt>]
  * [TdElement <td>]
  * [ThElement <th>]
  * [TrElement <tr>]
